title: Front-End Developer
description: Passionate about technology and constantly evolving in front-end development.
I strive to create intuitive, responsive, and creative interfaces.

about.title: About Me
description: Here you will find more information about me, what I do, and my current skills.
introduction: I am a student of Information Systems with projects in
HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, PHP, WordPress, Bootstrap, SASS, and Responsive Design.
Although I have no professional experience, I invest in personal projects to improve my knowledge.
I am focused, have good communication skills, work well in teams, and am flexible to face challenges. I am looking for opportunities to learn and grow professionally.
where I can contribute, learn, and grow. If you have an opportunity that matches my skills, I would be

roles.name: Front-End Developer
roles.descricao: I have been working as a freelance front-end developer since November 2023, developing modern and responsive interfaces, focusing on performance, usability, and innovation.

jobs.name: Architecture Portfolio

pokemon.title: Discover your Pokémon!
